message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI

The paper discusses the construction of a publication-level classification of research publications, which involves topics related to machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), and data mining (cs.DL). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of topic modeling (cs.SI) to identify topics in research publications. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.DL, followed by cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, and cs.SI.
